# AskError.systemError(underlyingError:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ PermissionKit ](/documentation/permissionkit)

- [ AskError ](/documentation/permissionkit/askerror)

- [ AskError.systemError(underlyingError:) ](/documentation/PermissionKit/AskError/systemError(underlyingError:))

-  AskError.systemError(underlyingError:) 

Case# AskError.systemError(underlyingError:)

iOS 26.1+iPadOS 26.1+Mac Catalyst 26.1+macOS 26.1+visionOS 26.1+

```
case systemError(underlyingError: any Error)
```

Deprecated

The underlying error is now propogated directly.

## [See Also](/documentation/PermissionKit/AskError/systemError(underlyingError:)#see-also)

### [Handling errors](/documentation/PermissionKit/AskError/systemError(underlyingError:)#Handling-errors)

[`case unknown`](/documentation/permissionkit/askerror/unknown)Indicates an unknown error response.[`case communicationLimitsNotEnabled`](/documentation/permissionkit/askerror/communicationlimitsnotenabled)Indicates communication limits isn’t enabled to send permission requests.[`case contactSyncNotSetup`](/documentation/permissionkit/askerror/contactsyncnotsetup)Indicates contact sync isn’t enabled to send permission requests.[`case invalidQuestion`](/documentation/permissionkit/askerror/invalidquestion)Indicates your permission request is invalid.
